characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain Tradition of spirit channeling.
characters.description2: Went to the Inner Temple for spiritual training and is now trapped there.
characters.description3: Went to the Inner Temple on the night of the incident and is now missing.
characters.description4: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain Tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Mia Fey
characters.description1: Maya's older sister and my eternal mentor in life and law. Passed away 2 years ago.

characters.name: Godot
characters.description1: A prosecutor who is shrouded in mystery. He seems to know me somehow.
characters.description2: The prosecutor for this case. He apparently holds some sort of grudge against Wright.* (when play switches to Edgeworth)
characters.description3: A prosecutor who is shrouded in mystery. He seems to know me somehow.* (when play returns to Wright)

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Maya's cousin, and channeling prodigy. She has amazingly powerful spiritual abilities.
characters.description2: Maya's cousin. Was apparently with the victim at the time of the crime. Currently missing.* (when play switches to Edgeworth)
characters.description3: Maya's cousin, and channeling prodigy. She has amazingly powerful spiritual abilities.* (when play returns to Wright)
characters.description4: Maya's cousin and channeling prodigy. She was found at the Inner Temple.

characters.name: Bikini
characters.description1: A hearty, motherly nun at Hazakura Temple, a channeling dojo deep in the mountains.
characters.description2: A nun at Hazakura Temple, a channeling dojo. She discovered the murder.
characters.description3: A nun from Hazakura Temple. Discovered the murder. Her bad back really bothers her.

characters.name: Elise Deauxnim
characters.description1: Kind-eyed author and illustrator of picture books. Pearls is huge fan of hers.
characters.description2: The victim of this incident. A picture book author of unknown age. Larry's teacher.
characters.description3: Real name: Misty Fey. Maya's mother and Master of the Kurain Channeling Technique.

characters.name: Iris
characters.description1: A nun at Hazakura Temple. She reminds me so much of "her"...
characters.description2: The defendant. A nun from Hazakura Temple. I know I've seen her somewhere before.
characters.description3: The defendant. A nun from Hazakura Temple. Doesn't seem to have any spiritual power.

characters.name: Laurice Deauxnim* (when playing as Wright) → Larry Butz* (when playing as Edgeworth)
characters.description1: Better known as Larry Butz. Current in training as Elise Deauxnim's pupil.
characters.description2: My friend since grade school. I don't remember how we became friends, though.* (when play switches to Edgeworth)
characters.description3: Better known as Larry Butz. Current in training as Elise Deauxnim's pupil.* (when play returns to Wright)
characters.description4: AKA Larry Butz. Saw an unbelievable sight at Heavenly Hall the night of the crime.

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: My friend since grade school. Fell from Dusky Bridge and is currently hospitalized.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: My mentor, Manfred von Karma's, daughter. Born/raised in Germany. Prosecutor at 13.
characters.description2: Legendary prosecutor Manfred von Karma's daughter. Became a prosecutor in Germany at 13.* (when play returns to Wright)

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: An old friend. Said to be #1 at the D.A.'s office. Studies foreign judicial systems now.

characters.name: Morgan Fey
characters.description1: Older sister of Misty Fey and mother of Pearl and Iris. Is in solitary confinement.

characters.name: ?????? → Dahlia Hawthorne
characters.description1: Morgan Fey's daughter and Iris's twin sister. Her father deals in jewelry apparently.
characters.description2: Morgan Fey's daughter and Iris's twin sister. She was executed last month.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.obtained: One of my possessions.* (when playing as Wright)  → Received from Phoenix Wright.* (when playing as Edgeworth)
evidences.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.* (when playing as Wright)
evidences.description2: Received from Wright. He wasn't serious when he gave this to me... was he?* (when playing as Edgeworth)

evidences.name: Magatama
evidences.obtained: Received from Maya Fey.* (when playing as Wright)  → Received from Phoenix Wright.* (when playing as Edgeworth)
evidences.description1: A present from Maya. It reacts to people who have secrets in their hearts.* (when playing as Wright)
evidences.description2: Received from Wright. Something about reading people's hearts... What utter nonsense.* (when playing as Edgeworth)

evidences.name: Oh! Cult! New Year's Issue
evidences.obtained: Received from Pearl Fey.
evidences.description1: An occult magazine featuring Hazakura Temple. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Hazakura Temple Map
evidences.obtained: Received from Elise Deauxnim.
evidences.description1: Shows Hazakura Temple and the surrounding area. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Hanging Scroll
evidences.obtained: Found at the Inner Temple Training Hall.
evidences.description1: Shows Misty Fey, Master of the Kurain Technique. Click here for details.
evidences.description2: Misty Fey's image is obscured by gravy. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Photo of Elise
evidences.obtained: Received from Laurice Deauxnim.
evidences.description1: Taken by her only pupil, Laurice Deauxnim. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Iris's Hood
evidences.obtained: Received from Iris.
evidences.description1: A magical hood said to offer protection from evil spirits.
evidences.description2: Received before the lights out bell the night of the crime. Protects from evil spirits.

evidences.name: Weather Data
evidences.obtained: Received from Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: A regional weather report for the night of the crime. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Note to Iris
evidences.obtained: Found in the Hazakura Temple Main Hall.
evidences.description1: Found in the Main Hall. Maybe she dropped it? Click here for details.

evidences.name: Victim's Staff
evidences.obtained: Found in the Hazakura Temple Courtyard.
evidences.description1: Carried by Elise Deauxnim when she was alive. Has her fingerprints on it.
evidences.description2: Has a sword hidden inside. No one knows this except Detective Gumshoe and I.
evidences.description3: Has a sword hidden inside. The actual weapon used to murder the victim.

evidences.name: Shichishito
evidences.obtained: Found in the Hazakura Temple Courtyard.
evidences.description1: The apparent murder weapon. Had the victim's blood and the suspect's fingerprints on it.
evidences.description2: Had the victim's blood and the suspect's fingerprints on it, but is not the murder weapon.

evidences.name: Elise's Autopsy Report
evidences.obtained: Received from Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Time: 10 - 11 PM. Cause: loss of blood from stab in back. Body fell 10 ft. after death.

evidences.name: Iris's Testimony
evidences.obtained: Received from Iris.
evidences.description1: Rang lights out bell at 10 PM and was then in her room until the murder was discovered.

evidences.name: Crime Photo
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidences.description1: The courtyard where Elise Deauxnim was murdered. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Tracks Photo
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidences.description1: Taken that night. From Main Gate to Dusky Bridge. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Larry's Sketch
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Larry Butz.
evidences.description1: Horrible sketch of what he saw the night of the crime. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Crystal Sphere
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Larry Butz.
evidences.description1: Found half-covered in snow near Dusky Bridge the night of the crime. Has blood on it.
evidences.description2: Found on outcropping near Dusky Bridge. Has blood on it. Came from the victim's staff.

evidences.name: Kurain Master's Talisman
evidences.obtained: Found in the Inner Temple Garden.
evidences.description1: Worn by Elise Deauxnim. Found in the garden of the Inner Temple.

evidences.name: Burnt Letter
evidences.obtained: Received from Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Found by Gumshoe in the Inner Temple incinerator. Click here for details.
evidences.description2: Orders from Morgan Fey. Opened once before. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Dagger
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Godot.
evidences.description1: Found behind a tree in the Inner Temple garden. The blood is being analyzed now.
evidences.description2: Found stuck in a pine tree in Inner Temple Garden. The blood doesn't match the victim's.

evidences.name: Stone Lantern
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Godot.
evidences.description1: A lantern from the Inner Temple garden. Was not lit the night of the crime.

evidences.name: Dusky Bridge Photo
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Godot.
evidences.description1: Taken the morning after the crime. Click here for details.
